name: woodland mitts
notes:
**this pattern was part of a live creative crochet corner event. this pattern is free when signing up for the creative crochet corner [newsletter][1]. a free replay of the live event, with a tutorial for the pattern can be accessed [here][2] or [here on youtube.][3]


  [1]: http://go.creativecrochetcorner.com/a33221/
  [2]: https://www.creativecrochetcorner.com/video/woodland-mitts/
